mn147:1.4: Five perceptions that ripen in freedom are taught at [dn33:2.1.139](), but apart from that we do not encounter this idea in the discourses.
mn147:1.8: The sitting cloth was a regular requisite of monastics ([pli-tv-bu-vb-pc89]()). It is rarely mentioned in the Pali Suttas (but see [dn16:3.1.3]()), but is regularly featured in the texts of the Sarvāstivāda schools.
